page.title: 09Hedges: Denbury & Ipplepen.
page.content: Hazel, Hawthorn, Pedunculate Oak, Sycamore. Counts (west side of lane). From{longditude 281800:}Bramble, Dogrose, Field Maple, Hawthorn, Hazel, Hornbeam, Ivy, Sycamore. From{81806859:}Ash, Blackthorn, Bramble, Bryony, Elder, Field Maple, Hawthorn, Hazel, Hornbeam, Ivy, Sycamore. From these counts we{concluded}that the hedges existed about the time of the first Domesday Book. { Other Counts:Orley Road, Ipplepen, } (north side). Ash, Bramble, Gorse, Hawthorn, Hazel, Ivy, Oak, Wayfaring Tree. This is an average of two counts.{Townsend Hill, Ipplepen,}(east side). Ash, Field Maple, Hazel, Hornbeam, Oak, Sycamore. This is an average of four counts.
